Html:
Hello All,

We have a new project that we intend to provide an ASP.Net UI using MVC and a Silverlight UI.

Any thoughts on if we can use Prism for the Silverlight UI in combination to MVC?

Thanks for any suggestions that you can offer :)

Bob Hanson

Hi Bob

As Silverlight is a client technology, there is nothing stopping you from using the Silverlight version of Prism, or building any Silverlight app for that matter that will work with an MVC backend.
